title: Enhancing Practical Programming Competencies: Designing a Smartphone-Based Blended Language Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize job-related language expressions with ≥90% accuracy within 8 weeks.
Learners can provide peer feedback ≥2 times per week in an LMS-based asynchronous discussion forum.
Learners can engage in self-directed learning of language content (e.g., audio clips, quizzes) ≥3 times per week via mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
